channel.title: Is zsh the default shell globally for useradd?
channel.description:
When I create new users will it default to setting the shell as zsh? Or do I have to manually edit passwd to set it?
Just curious as when I morphed a VM it would still default to sh when i created a new user.

item.title: Is zsh the default shell globally for useradd?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
init38:

When I create new users will it default to setting the shell as zsh?

No.

For that, Kicksecure would need to modify the /etc/adduser.conf configuration file.
